name: Procedural Playground
description:
A little sandbox I created using heightmaps, and voronoi noise. There is some fun interactivity to be had experimenting with the tools provided to see how the environment reacts! It is just a prototype but I might add more terrain types and tools at a later date,

How to Play

  •  Use WASD or the Arrow Keys to move the spawner. 
  • Use number keys to spawn things in the world. 
  • Use H to bring the help  menu back up. 
  • Have fun!

Tools

  1. Freeze Terrain
  2. Build Houses (must target land)
  3. Spawn Riverhead (must target water)
  4. Create Fire (must target land)
